fields.name: Mankeel Sliver Wings Electric Scooter
fields.description: Mankeel Silver Wings E-scooter is a portable, foldable electric scooter designed to let you travel in style. Featuring the latest and greatest in electric transportation technology, the E-scooter can move at speeds up to 25km/h and serves as a fun, green way to explore your city, make that last mile to work, or zip along beachside pathways. The E-Scooter comes with a 350w motor, providing you a Max speed of 25km/ph/ 15mph, and the 7.8 Ah battery ensures longer-range journeys. The Silver Wings is a Folding electric scooter, which is made from aluminum alloy. which provides a low density, high strength, lightweight, and stable pressure-resistant electric scooter. This is a fast electric scooter, which can cover long distances in a short time. Dual braking systems and headlights ensure safer riding at night. The Silver wings electric scooter uses 26-inch honeycomb shock-absorbing tires with high elasticity and wears resistance. At the same time, there are spring multiple shock absorption effects at the bottom of the pedal, which provides a more comfortable riding experience. This e-scooter comes with 10In pneumatic tires, for a more smooth and comfortable ride, and also has a good anti-slip effect. The Silver wings e-scooter comes with app control to lock the scooter, monitor speed, battery, mileage display, cruise control, and automatic timed shutdown. As a portable scooter, it is foldable and ultra-light, easy to store at home, under your desk at work, or in the trunk of your car. This E-scooter has an activation safety device. After powering on, push off with your feet, push down the accelerator and enjoy the ride.

fields.name: IENYRID M8 Electric Scooter-Preorder
fields.description:
Highlights
Powerful 500W Front Drive
The iENYRID M8 is a premium electric scooter that combines high performance and exceptional comfort. With its powerful front motor rated at 500 W, this scooter delivers impressive acceleration and stable riding experience.
48 V 10 Ah Lithium Battery
It is powered by a 48 V 10 Ah lithium battery, enabling a large range and prolonged riding without the need for recharging. Regardless of your needs and distances, the iENYRID M8 will be a reliable companion.
Front and Rear Suspension
To ensure superior comfort during your ride, the iENYRID M8 is equipped with both front and rear suspension. This allows for smooth riding even on uneven terrain, effectively absorbing shocks and vibrations. You will enjoy a comfortable and stable ride, regardless of the surface.
Advanced Lighting System
In addition to its exceptional performance and comfort, the iENYRID M8 features advanced lighting. With its front and rear LED lights, as well as ambient lighting on the sides, it ensures excellent visibility in all conditions. Moreover, the iENYRID M8 is equipped with durable and puncture-resistant solid tyres, designed for long-lasting use. This allows you to confidently traverse various surfaces without worries.
Bring A Superior Riding Experience
For superior riding experience, reliability, and comfort, the iENYRID M8 is an excellent choice. This electric scooter combines power, performance, and premium features to satisfy even the most demanding users. Whether you’re commuting to work or exploring the city, the iENYRID M8 will provide an unforgettable worry-free ride.

fields.name: iScooter iX5 Electric Scooter
fields.description:
Highlights
Three Modes
The iScooter iX5 allows the rider to switch between 3 modes: ECO, Standard and Sports modes that can be directly accessed by the intuitive LED dashboard.

600W Motor
High performance 600W motor and the maximum speed can reach up to 45km/h and can climb an incline of up to 25°.

Battery Life
High-quality 48V 15 Ah lithium battery, high power supply, full battery life up to 35-40km. The iScooter iX5 has well thought out safety features and protects against short circuits, excess current, overcharging, over-discharging, temperature and undervoltage.

Comfortable Seat
The thickened cushion with spring, a wide base folding structure, sit for long time without deformation.

Double Brakes
Featuring front and rear disc brakes, iScooter provides great stopping power and shorter braking distance.

Folding Design
Innovative folding design, the iScooter iX5 features a folding mechanism with a snap-on buckle. When folded, it is small and compact enough to fit in the trunk of a car or can be discreetly placed in a corner of an office.

fields.name: Kukirin (Kugoo) G2 Master Electric Scooter
fields.description:
High-quality Lithium Battery
The KuKirin G2 Master electric scooter is equipped with a 52V/1081.6KW.H high-performance battery and is optimized to achieve longer battery life. A single charge can support a driving distance of up to 70 kilometers, making long-term travel more convenient.
High-performance Dual Drive Motor
The KuKirin G2 Master electric scooter uses two 1000W high-performance dual-drive motors to provide powerful power, making it stress-free to go uphill, allowing the driver to travel more freely through various terrains, whether it is a flat road or a rugged path. All can be easily ridden. In addition, the dual-drive motor can also provide better control performance and stability, making you safer and more comfortable while driving.
Aluminum Alloy Material
The KuKirin G2Master electric scooter is made of high-quality aluminum alloy materials, making its structure sturdy and durable. The high-quality body and the special folding system not only provide the stability of folding and unfolding but also enhance the structural strength of the body, making the electric scooter more sturdy and durable and able to withstand the test of various use environments.
Extra Large Display
The ultra-large display screen of KuKirin G2 Master has high definition and can provide more detailed image and text display effects, allowing you to view various vehicle information and operation interfaces more clearly. You can control the driving speed and direction of the electric scooter through simple operations. The simple operation makes driving fun and provides consumers with a better driving experience.
Adjustable Pole
The KuKirin G2 Master electric scooter has adjustable poles. The adjustable pole allows the same electric scooter to adapt to the needs of different drivers to better control the driving posture and stability of the electric scooter. This helps improve driver safety and control over the e-scooter.
Hydraulic Shock Absorber System
KuKirin G2 Master adopts front and rear hydraulic shock absorbers. The front and rear hydraulic shock absorbers use the fluidity and compressibility of liquid to absorb and disperse vibration energy, effectively reducing the impact of vibration; according to road conditions and driving conditions, vibrations respond in real time, helping to reduce fatigue and improve driving safety, providing you with a more reliable, safe and comfortable travel experience.
Front and Rear Double Disc Brakes
KuKirin G2 Master adopts a front and rear double disc brake design. This design allows you to brake and decelerate more conveniently. The dual disc brakes can better distribute the braking force and maintain the stability and controllability of the electric scooter. Compared with traditional braking methods, the friction area of disc brakes is Larger, it dissipates heat better and therefore is more durable.
Cool Ambient Lighting Design
The cool ambient light design of KuKirin G2 Master not only changes color as the vehicle starts, increasing the driving fun and playability of young and fashionable user groups, but also makes the vehicle more eye-catching when driving at night, thereby ensuring Driving safety.

fields.name: KuKirin G4 Max Electric Scooter
fields.description:
KuKirin G4 Max boasts a sleek, sturdy hollow-shaped frame for enhanced aerodynamics. With dual hydraulic damping suspension and 4-piston hydraulic brakes, it offers unparalleled stability and comfort even at high speeds.
1600W*2 High-Performance Dual-drive Motor
Kukirin G4 MAX is equipped with 60V/1600W*2 motors, it can provide powerful power and torque, making acceleration and climbing easier. The maximum speed can reach 86km/h, which makes it a very fast and exciting electric scooter.
Removable Lithium Battery
The 60V/35.2Ah lithium battery has a range of 95km, which can meet the traveling needs of most people. The removable lithium battery design makes it easy to remove and install the battery, making it convenient for users to charge or replace the battery at any time.
Multifunctional Intelligent Display
The multi-functional intelligent display integrates multiple functions, including speed display, battery indicator, fault diagnosis, mileage recording, etc. Supports a variety of personalized settings, such as backlight brightness adjustment, startup mode adjustment, etc., to meet the usage habits and needs of different drivers.
Front & Rear Four-piston Oil Brakes 
The front and rear four-piston oil brakes realize braking through the principle of hydraulic pressure. They have the characteristics of stable braking performance, fast response speed, good heat dissipation performance and short braking distance. They can effectively cope with emergency braking situations at high speeds and provide drivers with Provides safer driving guarantee.
Fast Charging
The dual charging port design allows drivers to charge the battery with two chargers at the same time, saving charging time and improving charging efficiency and convenience.
Cool Lighting System
High-brightness LED headlights, taillights, and turn signals combined with cool ambient lights not only provide good lighting, but also ensure driving safety.
Front & Rear Dual Hydraulic Damping Shock Absorption
The front and rear hydraulic damping and shock-absorbing systems can better cope with bumps and uneven road surfaces, reducing the impact on the driver and providing a smoother and more natural driving experience.
12-inch Off-road Pneumatic Tire
12-inch ultra-wide off-road pneumatic tires have wider treads and off-road tread patterns, which can provide better grip and traction, shock absorption and buffering effects, absorb vibrations caused by uneven road surfaces, and improve driving comfort.

fields.name: KuKirin G1 Pro Folding Electric Scooter
fields.description:
High-capacity Lithium Battery
KuKirin G1 Pro uses a 960Wh large-capacity high-quality lithium battery to provide longer driving range, long life, fast charging, high safety, and a more durable and stable use experience.
Dual Drive Motor
KuKirin G1 Pro uses front and rear 800W dual-drive motors, which not only provide strong power and stable driving performance. In addition, it also has electronic braking and power distribution adjustment systems, making driving safer and more convenient.
Wide Pedals, Long Body
The wide pedal design allows the rider's feet to relax and reduces leg fatigue caused by long-term riding. At the same time, the long body design also provides more space for cyclists, making riding more comfortable.
Built-in Display
KuKirin G1 Pro uses a built-in display, which not only hides the wiring inside the vehicle, but also reduces the confusion and exposure of external wiring, making the vehicle look neater and more high-end.
Front & Rear Double Disc Brakes
KuKirin G1 Pro uses front and rear dual disc brakes, which have good ventilation and heat dissipation and stronger braking performance. Even when facing high-speed driving in complex off-road environments, it can brake easily, giving you the confidence to stop whenever you want.
Ambient Lighting Design
The cool ambient lights not only change colors as the vehicle starts, increasing the driving fun and playability of young and fashionable user groups, but also make the vehicle more attractive when driving at night. It attracts people's attention and ensures the safety of driving at night.

fields.name: ENGWE Y10 Electric Scooter

Powerful Motor

Comfortable and Safe Riding Experience
The Y10 scooter is designed to accommodate riders with a height range of 155-180cm. It also includes LED headlights, a taillight, and an LED meter for increased visibility and convenience during rides.

fields.description:
The Mankeel MK083 electric scooter comes with a long-range 15 miles battery. Not many scooters in this price range will offer such capacity. There are other electric scooters with the same specs but small-size batteries. It only takes three seconds to fold this scooter and carry it wherever you want. Traveling to adventure outdoors can be fun because of these features. The design of this electronic scooter is safe to ride, and there are safety brakes. Also, you can store it under desks and in office spaces. The reason for this is its compact size when it folds.




Mankeel MK083 Electric Scooter Fold in Three Seconds
The secure folding design of this electric scooter lets you flip down the folding lever. It catches onto a latch on the rear wheel. Thus, it folds safely and becomes compact. The weight of the Mankeel MK083 electric scooter is only 27.9lbs. There are durable materials that are corrosion-free and conduct thermal activity. Therefore, the scooter can last longer and needs no maintenance. The hook it uses is of an aluminum alloy element that is sturdy and lightweight. Press The Brakes to Charge Battery Via Kinetic Energy Making 15-22 Miles Range Battery Capacity

The Mankeel MK083 electric scooter comes with all electronic protections. There is overcurrent, short circuit, overcharging, over-discharging, and temperature protection for this scooter. Therefore, you can ride it with comfort and peace of mind. Also, you can check the health of the battery using a smartphone app. So, commute using this electric scooter or maneuver stairs and pavements with ease.

fields.name: DUOTTS D66 Electric Scooter
fields.description:
Highlights
Powerful Performance
The DUOTTS D66 electric scooter features a 60V 1800W*2 motor (JYS brand), delivering a maximum speed of 65-70km/h. It can effortlessly handle inclines of up to 45°, making it suitable for various terrains and challenging conditions.
Long Battery Life
Equipped with a 60V 24Ah battery composed of Chinese 18650 cells, the D66 offers a range of 50-60 km on a single charge. This allows for extended rides without worrying about running out of power. The scooter's charging time is 8-10 hours, ensuring quick and efficient recharging.
Durable and Safe Design
The D66 features an aluminum alloy frame, providing both strength and durability. It is equipped with front and rear fenders, ensuring protection against splashes and debris. The scooter also has a waterproof grade of IPX4, making it resistant to light rain and water splashes.
Comfortable Riding Experience

fields.name: DUOTTS D99 Off-Road Electric Scooter Preorder (Arriving in Mid March)
fields.description:
Highlights
The DUOTTS D99 is equipped with full-size 13-inch pneumatic road tires that provide excellent ride comfort, traction and rolling efficiency for long rides, while enhancing stability to give you a smooth ride. It is equipped with an extremely powerful 60V 3000W*2 motor, which can be used in single motor mode or dual motor mode.
The DUOTTS D99 is a high-performance dual-motor, dual-suspension electric scooter that brings off-road performance to urban environments. The D99 is equipped with front and rear hydraulic/disc brakes with EBS for great stopping power. The front suspension system is supported by two long-travel H-shaped shock absorbers, and the rear suspension is supported by two high-strength springs for shock absorption. Under high-speed driving, the vehicle body is still stable and can filter road bumps.
The DUOTTS D99 is switchable between single drive and dual motor drive, allowing the rider to switch between 2 modes: ECO mode and TURBO mode. Riding in ECO single motor mode will increase the range of the scooter by 3 times compared to the TURBO dual motor option.
DUOTTS D99 is equipped with front and rear hydraulic brakes. Compared with disc brakes, oil brakes are more effective, and the braking distance is shorter (≤2m), which greatly improves the emergency capability and safety of riding.
The new DUOTTS D99 is an excellent choice if you want a fast electric scooter with great range and well-thought-out safety features.

fields.name: FIIDO X upgraded Folding Electric Bike
fields.description:
Features










Award-winning Design, Stand out from the Herd
Ever feel the need to get on a ride stress-free? The Fiido X is the answer. An eye-catcher with a minimalist vibe, Fiido X takes you through the streets with style and powers your climb with no noise. Best companion for your daily commutes and light adventures.

















Anti-theft Battery Security System
You don't need to worry about the battery security any more. With the exclusive battery security system, the battery will be removed by the unique code only, which means nobody but you can unlock the battery and the bike, making the theft effectively pointless.

















Healthy Exercises Empowered by Torque Sensor
New to electric bikes? No problem. Equipped with the modern torque sensor that measures if and how hard you are pedaling, Fiido X brings a much more intuitive riding experience to electric bike riders, saving you the worry of learning how to use a throttle and the jerky moves associated with a cadence sensor. You still get the exercise you need, hassle-free. Plus, no stress over local regulations on having a throttle.

















Ready to Ride with a No-brainer Setup
Easy assembly with just the pedals to screw in, you can get on your ride within 5 minutes of unboxing it.

















Removable Battery with a Long Range
The patented battery boasts a whopping 130 km (80.7 miles) range per charge, more than enough for any daily commutes. With easy removal and a sleek look, it frees you from any battery-related concerns.

















Greater Folding Frame
The signature clean-looking frame with a folding mechanism from Fiido X has stepped up its game. With a testing process that reaches twice the strength set by the EN15194 standard, the new frame is stronger than ever. Still, commuters get to collapse it down and fit it in a car trunk or in public transport, enjoying Fiido X's unmatched flexibility.

















Puncture-proof Tires
Equipped with puncture-proof tires to minimize the risk of blowout

















 




 










All fiido bikes come with mudguards and light










Creating the aesthetic of future
Fiido X perfectly present you the ultimate design aesthetic style with a sense of futuristic technology. The frame line is smooth and simple, with a delicate nebulas blue color, which creating a unique electric bicycle with the beauty of the future.






Lighter but stronger
Fiido X adopts magnesium alloy integral molding process, The frame weight is only 3KG, it’s very light and portable.












Innovative Hidden Folding Mechanism
You won't find any prominent folding structure on the Fiido X frame. We have used an original mechanism to optimize the folding mechanism of the frame. The hidden folding mechanism is the ultimate combination between art and technology.






Easily to fold, let’s go
It only takes about 10s to fold the Fiido X, the folded volume is less than 0.15 cubic meter, which can easily fit into the trunk, or pushing ahead. It’s your perfect pal of traveling and commuting. 20-inch tire is also a perfect balance of comfortable riding experience and portability.












Removable and portable battery
You can easily remove the seat post battery for charging, which is easy to replace and carry. It’s also convenient to adjust the seat height however you want.






Innovative rail-type power, beauty and a beast
Fiido X is world’s the first folding electric bike with built-in seat pole to transmit battery power, without ugly exposed wires, it looks like a beautiful bike. Equipped with a 417.6Wh ternary lithium battery, which makes the moped mode range more than 130KM. Providing you more power output for any riding needs.






Stunning strength shows the stunning experience
Based on the ergonomic design, and the primary consideration of the combination between riding performance and comfort, leading Fiido X be able to present you the delightful riding experience which beyond the expectation.






Torque sensor, carefree riding
Fiido X is equipped with a leading torque sensor system, which can sense the rider’s wills. With the 40N/m high torque motor. No more fear about the hillside, let’s conquer the vast mountains more easily.






More intelligent , more relieved
Fiido X also adds a unique key-less security system, replacing the traditional key lock with a smart code lock, which perfectly be anti-theft. It’s also a power switch to avoid the annoying key lost problem.

fields.name: Kukirin (Kugoo) V3 Electric Bike
fields.description:
Tailor for Off-Road Ventures
The KuKirin V3 mountain electric bike is meticulously designed to thrive in mountain landscapes. Boasting an impressive 500W motor, in tandem with a Shimano 7-speed drivetrain, it empowers riders to seamlessly tackle inclines and challenging off-road trails. Its oversized 27.5’’ pneumatic tires are enriched with specialized patterns, delivering optimal grip by enhancing friction between the tires and the road. This, in conjunction with its exceptional shock absorption and noise reduction properties, firmly establishes it as the go-to choice for avid mountain bikers.
Removable Battery for Hassle-Free Charging
Say goodbye to carrying the entire bike for charging. The KuKirin V3 electric bike for adults features a lithium battery that can be easily detached, enabling you to charge it separately. The removable battery also enhances portability, and with a dedicated lock on the aluminum alloy frame, it ensures added security.
Unrivaled Range
With a substantial 15Ah lithium-ion battery, the KuKirin V3 electric bike achieves a remarkable pure electric range of up to 60 kilometers. Its exceptional power-assisted range extends to an unparalleled 90 kilometers, effectively eliminating any concerns about running out of battery power during your mountain adventures.
Flexible Riding Modes
The KuKirin V3 mountain electric bike offers a trio of speed modes: low speed, power-assisted speed, and high speed. Engage in leisurely fitness rides with the low-speed mode, alleviate the physical strain with power-assisted speed, or master diverse terrains with ease using the high-speed mode.
Ultra Safe for Mountain Adventures
Crafted from sturdy aluminum alloy, it ensures durability for mountain biking. Its front suspension, engineered from high-strength aluminum alloy, enhances resistance to wear and scratches. Equipped with front and rear dual disc brakes, the bike's braking system offers heightened responsiveness and shorter stopping distances, ensuring a secure and confident riding experience.

fields.description:
HIGHLIGHTS
750w Brushless Rear Motor
48V 17Ah/20AH Lithium Battery
45km/h Max Speed
20×4.0 Inch Fat Tire
70-100km by Assistant
Gradeability: 30Degree

OLDING DESIGN
The GW20 20-inch electric bicycle can be folded out from the beam simply in a few seconds.
In addition, It’s a Portable and practical foldable e-bike. So you can easily and conveniently carry GW20 on trains, private cars, RVs, and boats.
The perfect combination of folding and off-road can go anywhere with you.
 
4.0 INCH FAT TIRE
Designed by professional 4.0 wide tires, the GW20 Electric Buggy adds an extremely cut and abrasion-resistant material to the sidewall of selected mountain bike tires. This densely woven fabric is lightweight and highly elastic.
Well, To ensure that the tire’s performance is not compromised, the tread pattern is designed to provide good grip and stability, with a deep and wide tread design for good drainage.
So, this electric fat tire bike GW20 It is very suitable for driving on the city, snowy, mountainous and rough roads.
 IZED COMFORT SEAT
Our Gw20 fat tire electric bike has a oversized Comfort seat with a shock-absorbing elastomer. This is a lightweight foam seat made of high-quality waterproof artificial leather and filled with decompression function, bringing you a very comfortable experience.
The ED tower spring of the saddle base eliminates road or surface vibration that is usually directly transmitted to the spine, helping you to drive more smoothly and comfortably on off-road or flat roads.
So CMACEWHEEL GW20 is a more comfortable ebike than other old small saddle mountain e-bikes.
 750W BRUSHLESS MOTOR
48V 750W Brushless Motor has high performance, low noise, and low consumption.
It is perfectly combined with the controller to reduce friction and make the electric bicycle run more smoothly and keep working more efficiently. Allow you to enjoy smoother and more efficient travel during riding.
So let the 750 watt folding electric bike GW20 becoming your indispensable partner.
MECHANICAL DISC BRAKES
The front and rear 110 large drum brakes, shorten the braking distance, ensure greater stability and safety. Mechanical disc brakes can make braking easier and more effective.
It is very convenient to use for beginners.
e 7-speed Shimano system is the standard transmission mechanism mentioned by many riders.
Riders can adjust the bike’s gear according to personal preference to adapt to different road conditions, such as tilt, bumps, or other difficulties. The 7-speed Shimano bike can travel on different terrains.
The lower gears make it easier to pedal, and the higher gears make it easier to move downhill.
So you will engory double funs of Conventional bikes and electric bicycles on GW20 folding electric bike.
 
LOCKABLE EXTENDED SUSPENSION FORK
GW20’s high-strength shock absorber front fork allows you to be more relaxed and comfortable when riding, and no longer afraid of bumps.
The lock switch can be manually locked or opened depending on riding conditions.
The separate fork-shaped bridge design makes the outer tube of the front fork stronger and effectively prevents dust pollution during riding.
 
MULTI-FUNCTION COLOR LCD 
Our folding Fat tire electric bike -cmacewheel GW20 is equipped with a new color instrument S2 from 2022. S2 is very superior in technology.
As to speed display, it includes real-time speed “RT SPEED”, “MAX SPEED”, average speed “AVG SPEED” and Km/h or mile/h display can be set according to customer habits.
As well as, It has an intelligent battery indicator that provides stable battery reminders through an optimization algorithm. S2 has a 5levels of backlight brightness so you can change it to be a comfortable brightness at night.
And the S2 still has a Mileage display, Output power indication, Walk assist function, Speed measuring magnets number adjustment, and so on.
So the cmacewheel color lcd fat tire electric bike is coming from 2022
 3 RIDING MODELS
The pedal assist mode(PAD) allows you to travel 70-100 kilometers, while the electric mode allows you to travel around 40-60 kilometers.
If the bicycle runs out of power, you can switch to manual mode. Ideally, you can combine these three modes, allowing you to fully enjoy the excitement, speed, and relaxation during riding!
It’s much better than only PAD electric bikes.
 
WUXING TWIST THROTTLE

The CMACEWHEEL GW20 equipped the wuxing twist throttle instead of a thumb accelerator.
You know,  the twist throttle is easier to accelerate your ebike like a motor bicycle on bumpy roads, In simpler operation mode, you can choose the DIY cruise control function to save a lot of effort
And on left, universal phone mount attached to the handlebar with a USB port allows you to use your phone for navigating, making a call, or recording while riding.
 














FREE FRONT CARGO BASKET



The GW20 is also equipped with a sturdy metal basket, which is quick and easy to install and can hold 20 pounds of any items you want to bring.
You can ride him when you go to work, school, shopping, or hunting.

fields.name: Fafrees F20 Light Preorder (Arriving end of March)
fields.description:
FEATURES

Predestined for everyday use by the entire family, Fafrees F20 Light compact e-bike is made for the city, for the road and for easy transport. Foldable, portable, storable, comfortable, and constantly prepared for the road ahead. With 20-inch tires, 250W hub motor, 14.5Ah huge battery, Shimano 7-speed shifter, and adjustable handlebar and seat, this step-through electric bike is the perfect example of how adaptability and toughness can coexist.





250W Geared Hub Motor
250W brushless motor with 35N.M maximum torque combined with intelligent controller produce 15Mph maximum speed. Peak power can reach 437W, which was designed in-house to help you go steeper at lower speeds. The rear drive motor is easier to handle, better traction giving, and less maintenance required.




Removable 36V 14.5Ah Battery
The 14.5Ah high-capacity battery extends your riding distance up to 68miles on a single charge with assisted mode. Take it home and recharge it whenever you want with the lock design. You can pick between three support modes – Electric, Power assisted, and manpower mode.










Waterproof LCD Display
The large-screen waterproof LCD display shows various data such as speed, battery, mileage, and gear. It has a walk assistance mode and cruise control function to help your riding whenever you need.




Shimano 7-Speed Shifting
Shimano's 7-speed shifter and derailleur offer precise and smooth shifting over its full range, ensuring that your drivetrain remains responsive over time.










Mechanical Disc Brakes
Commuter bikes need to have serious braking power. That’s why we kitted this bike with power-off brake levers paired with large rotors. You’ll have the control and confidence to stop exactly when you need to.




Step-Through Foldable Frame
Folds in less than 30-seconds. With a step-through frame, you can comfortably pedal and stand over the frame. The compact construction made of lightweight components makes it easy to compact e-bike into the means of transport and take up little space in it. The adjustable riser bar allows you to personalize your fit, with handlebar and seat tubes that move in and out for comfort.










Riding Safety At Night
StVZO compliant LED headlight and rear brake light to ensure night riding safety.




Empathetic Design
20-inch wheels are flexible and agile, making them comfortable in busy city traffic. The strong rear hanger can be used to attach a variety of bicycle rear seat bags and baskets. F20 light is outfitted with front and rear fenders and supports pure electric mode, making it ideal for any trip.










Dimensions
The adjustable seat tube makes it ideal for teenagers and adults 155-195cm tall with a maximum load of 264lbs

45°

48V 17.5AH REMOVABLE BATTERY, HIGH CAPACITY, WATERPROOF BATTERY
The 48V 17.5AH battery pack is commonly used in electric bikes and provides a relatively high capacity compared to standard e-bike batteries. It can reach 50km in pure electric mode and 80km in power assisted mode. 48V 17.5AH

Capability
Shimano 7-Speed Gears
Shimano 7-speed shifting system allows the rider to shift between seven different gear ratios. It uses a derailleur to move the chain between different sized sprockets on the rear wheel, providing a range of gear options for different terrain and riding conditions.
20*4.0 Inches Fat Tires
Our e-bike comes equipped with 20*4.0 all-terrain fat tires, providing anti-skid and anti-vibration features for a comfortable ride. With a width of 10cm, enjoy a wider span and enhanced performance.
Front Spring Fork
Front fork suspension provides shock absorption and increased comfort for the rider. It can compress and rebound in response to impacts from the road or trail. This helps to smooth out bumps and reduce fatigue on the arms and upper body.



Rear Rack
Bike rear racks are usually made of lightweight and durable materials such as aluminum alloy or steel. They are designed to withstand the weight of cargo and provide stability during rides. Equipped with solid rear rack, stable and reliable, make you carry your cargo very easily. maximum load up to 200KG.



Front And Rear Hydraulic Brakes
Front and rear hydraulic disc brakes provide superior stopping power compared to mechanical brakes. The hydraulic system amplifies the force applied to the brake lever, resulting in stronger and more reliable braking performance. This is especially important for e-bike that often have higher speeds and heavier weights.



Smart LCD Display

Whether you are cruising to work or going on an adventure -this folding mini electric bike is perfect for you. With 250W high speed motor and 48V 10.4A long range battery, pls enjoy your city with an effortless ride anytime anywhere.

With a 18650 high performance Car Grade battery,globally insured by CPIC,48v 10.4A stable and strong output,you can always enjoy a longer and safe trip that takes you up to 30~60 miles on a single charge. Feel your city with a simple,comfortable and reliable ride.

With five levels of pedal assist, getting yourself anywhere on the folding electric bicycle can be as much of, or as easy, a workout as you want. If you need that little extra boost to get you home, or just want to enjoy the scenery, then the throttle function will take care of powering you along.
FOLDABLE

Shimano 7-speed gearbox

350W brushless rear motor

DETACHABLE BATTERY

suspension

fields.name: FAFREES F20 Pro City Electric Bike

Highlights
The F20 PRO is Fafrees‘s latest stylish work of art without compromising its practicality. It features the latest dazzling chameleon paint with metal flake that will show up in different shades in the sun. Make you stand out from the crowd of cyclists. Another plus is the battery uses the most advanced automotive-grade 21700 battery cells, with a battery capacity of 18ah, providing longer battery life and safer use experience. F20 pro follows the F20 step-through frame design, and 3.0 fat tires, so you can power up all kinds of terrains, easily carry groceries, and explore new destinations knowing you’ll have more than enough boost to do it all. The low-step frame are even easier to mount and dismount. They’re perfect for riders who want extra comfort and confidence on every ride.
250W HIGH-SPEED BRUSHLESS MOTOR
250W brushless motor with 40N.M maximum torque combined with intelligent controller produce 25KM/H maximum speed. The rear drive motor is easier to handle, better traction giving,  and less maintenance required. The rotation sensor on the rear wheel drive easily suffice the daily commute and adventurous riding for a larger number of people, including more elderly riders.
REMOVABLE 36V 18AH ULTRA-LARGE BATTERY
Adopt the most advanced 21700 automotive grade lithium battery, expand the battery capacity to 18ah in limited space. With lockout key, easy to remove and take it home for charging, which can last up to 90km with pure power-assist on a single charge.
SMART LCD DISPLAY WITH EASY CONTROL
You can change the level of powered assistance from the LCD screen mounted on the handlebars. and the control panel is at hand for easy viewing and control. It provides information on speed, mileage, power, etc. configurable for personalized, with an intuitive program that reacts to the individual's cycling style to deliver a seamless cycling experience.
DUAL DISC BRAKES & SHIMANO SHIFTER
Shimano 7 speed shifter derailleur provide accurate and smooth shifting ensure that your drivetrain is responsive for a long time. With front and rear mechanical 160mm disc brakes and power-offer brake levers, you can stop the bike in a more effective and quick way.
FRONT SUSPENSION & REAR RACK
F20 PRO provides great comfort with a 75mm travel oil suspension fork. With adjustment knobs for preload and lockout so you can dial it in for your weight and riding terrain. The aluminum rear rack is compatible with the cargo platform for quick and easy mounting of rack accessories. Perfect for storing all your stuff effortlessly for your next e-bike trip. 
CHAOYANG 20*3.0” FAT TIRES & INTEGRATED WHEEL
CHAOYANG 3.0 fat tires have great elasticity, which increases the contact area with the ground, enhances grip and ride stability, easily adapts to any terrain.The one-piece design of the wheel, rim, and body makes the  ride more stable, and rough road conditions or hard riding will not deform the wheels at all. 
FRONT LIGHT & REAR BRAKE LIGHT
Bright LED headlight and rear brake light to ensure night riding safety 
 16” STEP-THROUGH FOLDABLE FRAME
This e-bike has a low-step design with adjustable handlebars and a seat, making it perfect for both teenagers and adults 160-195cm tall and max load of 120 kg. It can be folded up to an ultra-compact size, is easy to transport and can be stowed in any vehicle suitcase, ideal for vacation travel and commuting.
THREE WORKING MODES
There are three working modes: electric mode, PAS mode, and manpower mode.
EASY SERVICING OF FAFREES EBIKE
Plug and play wiring system makes maintaining/replacing/repairing all electrical parts a breeze.

For Unrivalled Speed and Power

Superior Battery And Range
The T1 comes ready for action with a 960wh high-capacity battery capable of a 150km range on power-assisted trips, and an impressive 100km range on a full-throttle trip. With quick charge included, the T1 will be up and running easily for consecutive long journeys - ideal for the frequent traveler.
Ergonomic Simplicity
The T1’s user-friendly design is centered around providing a comfortable riding experience. The extra-wide saddle and shock-absorbing seat tube, paired with the solid long-stroke suspension fork and 20” tires, ensure that the longest of trips and the hardest of trails are undemanding and uncomplicated.
Carrying Capacity To Suit Every Need
Made up of an Aluminum Alloy frame and solid Magnesium Alloy one-piece wheels, the Fiido T1 can withstand a massive weight of 200kg. This e-bike has an innovative weight distribution design, granting the riding seat a carrying capacity of 120kg, with an additional 80kg capacity for the rear rack. The 20”*4.0 all-terrain fat tires ensure that even the most daunting of trails are easily traversable.























Your Welfare At The Forefront
The T1 is dedicated to keeping you as safe as possible, that’s why it’s been equipped with a high-contrast display that delivers all essential information at a glance - even in direct sunlight - to ensure complete engagement in your surroundings.

fields.name: FIIDO M1 Pro Electric Bike
fields.description:
FEATURES
All fiido bikes come with mudguards and light
Dual Shock Absorption Structure
equipped with CST 20 * 4.0 tires, 52 tooth chain disk and Shimano 7-speed transmission with good shock absorption effect and riding stability. The 20*4-inch wheels possessing ultra-wide rims coordinate with all-terrain fat tires, with the addition of the anti-skid tread pattern design, helps you easily traverse the jungle, sand, rocky beach, puddles and other forbidding terrains. 
Lithium Battery
Built-in detachable rechargeable, a large battery capacity of 12.8Ah at most, with a long endurance
500 TIMES RECHARGEABLE
The high-torque 48V battery can achieve rapid starting acceleration and a maximum range of 130KM on a 12.8Ah fully-charge capacity, enabling you to travel long distances with ease. It only takes 7 hours to fully charge. And the 500 cycles of rechargeable battery life allows you to venture out again anytime.
Three Riding Modes
Pure electric mode, riding mode, and electric power-assisted mode. When the accelerator is turned, it is automatically electric mode; without the accelerator, stepping on the pedal is electric power-assisted mode
Folding Body
The body is made of high-strength aluminum alloy, light and rust-free; the body supports folding in half, which is suitable for most of the car's back-up carriages
500W STRONG MOTOR
A 500W strong motor comes with a wide-range 7-speed deraileur, the top speed of M1 Pro can reach 40kph(24.8mph), which assists to reach your destination promptly regardless of terrains or weather conditions. and the 7-speed seamless shift fully achieves a freewheeling control. Due to European regulations, the motor is identified as 250W.
Dual Disc Brake
Front and rear dual disc brake, more stable and effective brake
SHOCK ABSORBER
The full suspension shock absorber eliminates all bumps, therefore you no longer have to steer clear of pebbles or rocky trails, the well-performed M1 Pro guarantees a safer and smoother cycling.
PORTABLE STRUCTURE
The adjustable bicycle body and portable structure, along with a collapsible size of 96*79*45cm, makes it convenient to carry whether it’s on the car trunk, subway or train.
Tech + Specs
The unique electric bicycle aesthetics that Fiido endows M1Pro truly achieves the perfect balance between form and function.
